name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Software Engineer with 13+ years of experience in delivering high-performance applications across the healthcare and financial industries. Proficient in **Java**, **Spring**, and RESTful API development, with hands-on expertise in **MySQL** and **Elastic Stack** including **Elasticsearch**. Experienced in cloud-native deployments using **AWS**, and containerization with **Docker**. Skilled in Agile methodologies, including **Scrum**, fostering effective **teamwork** and adaptability in fast-paced environments.

Expertise in building robust applications with **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, while utilizing frameworks such as **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Adept in developing AI/ML-powered platforms that harness predictive analytics, automation, and real-time processing. Proficient in implementing microservices, event-driven architectures, and CI/CD pipelines.

Strong background in compliance-driven development, ensuring alignment with HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2 standards. Knowledgeable in MLOps, including model training, serving, and orchestration using **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**, driving project success through innovative solutions and continuous growth.
